trying_to_connect_to_address: Trying to connect to device with address %1$s
connected_please_make_sure: %1$s was successfully connected. Please make sure, that it is turned on when starting the run!
connection_unsuccessful: Connection was not successful. Are you sure that you picked the correct device? Device must support Bluetooth Low Energy!
do_you_want_to_delete: Do you want to delete all stored data? (Results, Course, Name)
do_you_want_to_delete_results: Do you want to delete all stored results?
please_wait_while_the_course_is_loaded: Please wait while the course is loaded
enter_nickname: Enter a nickname by which your instructor can recognize you later.
caching_the_map: Downloading the map… This can take some time, please be patient!
want_to_activate_gps: Do you want to turn on GPS? This will only record your position for later evaluation on the website. You still have to scan QR codes!
do_you_really_want_to_stop_run: Do you really want to stop the current run? Your result will not be saved.
wrong_cp: This is the wrong control point!
at_start: You are at the start location! Click \"Start!\" to begin.
borgMessage: You are doing well so far! How exhausted are you?
you_can_skip: You can skip the next control point! Go directly to control point #%1$d!
you_can_skip_finish: You can skip the next control point! Go directly to the finish!
turn_on_location_qr: Please turn on location to use GPS!
turn_on_location_gps: GPS mode requires location updates. Please turn on location!
error_cannot_fetch_course_probably_due_t: Network error! Is the device connected to the internet?
missing_tiles_due_to_internet: Could not download the map. Is the device connected to the internet?
click_result_link: Click \'%1$s\' in the menu to view all your runs and results.
result_not_uploaded_yet: This result will be uploaded as soon as a network connection is available.
session_has_not_startet_yet: This session has not started yet! It will begin on %1$s.
session_has_already_ended: This session is already over! It ended on %1$s.
error_double_scan_unique_qr_code: This QR Code has already been used!
error_course_not_found: Course not found. Did you use the right QR Code?
mc_hint: There may be multiple correct answers.
